   - **October 11:**
     - Look for the row with "date" as "october 11".
     - Row 4 has the date "october 11".
     - Check the "location" column in this row.
     - The location is "yankee stadium (i)".

3. **Conclusion:**
   - Both conditions of the claim are satisfied:

     - There was a game at Yankee Stadium (I) on October 11.

Since both parts of the claim are verified to be true, the overall claim is true.

- For October 11: Row index 3, Column name "location".
